div.p: Trend of Normal Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) during 2001 to 2010 ( a) Annual ( b) Winter (Dec to February, DJF) ( c) Pre-monsoon (March to May, MAM) ( d) Monsoon (June to August, JJA) and ( e) Post-monsoon (September to November, SON). Source: MODIS –Terra (5.6 × 5.6 km). The map was generated using MATLAB 2015b, www.mathworks.com.
